description: Micheal Brandon, Bret Wolfe, Michael Soldier, and Bruce Jenningsperform in a sizzling fourgy filmed by Team Raging Stallion in the waythat only Chris Ward can - the dramatic shots of huge, hard,sculptured dicks are an art unto themselves. Apile driving pounding that literally fucks the cum out of the bottoms,wraps up one of the most amazing Raging Stallion movies evermade.
title: The Dirty Director
